Uses of Package
org.opensha2.eq.model

  • Packages that use org.opensha2.eq.model 
    Package Description
    org.opensha2.calc
    Hazard calculation classes and utilties.
    org.opensha2.eq.fault.surface  
    org.opensha2.eq.model
    Provides the Source representations and containers, as well as GroundMotionModel containers for use in a HazardModel.
    org.opensha2.gmm
    Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.
    org.opensha2.programs
    Entry points for conducting probabilisitic seismic hazard analysis (PSHA) calculations.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.eq.model used by org.opensha2.calc 
    Class and Description
    HazardModel
    A HazardModel is the top-level wrapper for earthquake Source definitions and attendant GroundMotionModels used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses (PSHAs) and related calculations.
    Source
    An earthquake Source; usually some physical or pseudo-representation of a fault and associated IncrementalMfds governing the size and rate of all possible Ruptures.
    SourceType
    Identifier for different earthquake Source types.
    SystemSourceSet
    Wrapper class for related SystemSourceSet.SystemSources.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.eq.model used by org.opensha2.eq.fault.surface 
    Class and Description
    Distance
    Distance value wrapper.
    Rupture
    A Rupture is a proxy for an actual earthquake and encapsulates all the source information required by a ground motion model (Gmm).
  • Classes in org.opensha2.eq.model used by org.opensha2.eq.model 
    Class and Description
    AreaSource
    Area source representation.
    AreaSource.GridScaling
    Point source discretization scaling.
    ClusterSource
    Cluster source representation.
    Distance
    Distance value wrapper.
    Distance.Type 
    FaultSource
    Fault source representation.
    FaultSourceSet
    Container class for related FaultSources.
    GmmSet
    Wrapper class for GroundMotionModels associated with a SourceSet.
    GridSourceSet
    A container class for related, evenly-spaced PointSources with varying magnitudes and/or rates derived from an IncrementalMfd at each grid node.
    GridSourceSet.Key
    An internally used identifier for this source set.
    HazardModel
    A HazardModel is the top-level wrapper for earthquake Source definitions and attendant GroundMotionModels used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses (PSHAs) and related calculations.
    InterfaceSource
    Subduction source representation.
    MagUncertainty
    Wrapper class for magnitude uncertainty data.
    PointSourceType
    Point source implementation identifier.
    Rupture
    A Rupture is a proxy for an actual earthquake and encapsulates all the source information required by a ground motion model (Gmm).
    Source
    An earthquake Source; usually some physical or pseudo-representation of a fault and associated IncrementalMfds governing the size and rate of all possible Ruptures.
    SourceAttribute
    HazardModel source XML attributes.
    SourceElement
    HazardModel source XML elements.
    SourceSet
    Wrapper class for groups of Sources of similar SourceType.
    SourceType
    Identifier for different earthquake Source types.
    SystemSourceSet
    Wrapper class for related SystemSourceSet.SystemSources.
    SystemSourceSet.SystemSource
    A single source in a fault system.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.eq.model used by org.opensha2.gmm 
    Class and Description
    Distance
    Distance value wrapper.
  • Classes in org.opensha2.eq.model used by org.opensha2.programs 
    Class and Description
    HazardModel
    A HazardModel is the top-level wrapper for earthquake Source definitions and attendant GroundMotionModels used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses (PSHAs) and related calculations.
